name: Paint the Town Red (itch) (rarelikeaunicorn)
description:
You are having the best night of your life! Go out with your friends and wreck the entire town. Avoid the police and keep each other safe as you run everywhere with reckless abandon.

~

My first minigame in Puzzlescript as I learn to navigate the editor. Paint the Town Red could be seen as the lovechild of Tron and Splatoon in a dystopic authoritarian near-future.

Many thanks to Increpare and the awesome Puzzlescript editor for making this it so easy to put together a bite-sized side project. Check out this link if you'd like to play on the Puzzlescript site and/or build your own puzzles above and beyond what I offered here!
